title: League Family eXperience: A League-Themed Dance Set
body:
Over the past few months, I led a training team (beginner/first time dancers) with two fellow summoners, and we decided to theme our set around our common interest: League of Legends! We recently performed our set in front of hundreds of people at our end-of-the-year showcase, and I thought I would share it here as well!

Our choreography isn't America's Best Dance Crew level by any means, but it was really fun to work with these enthusiastic dancers and put together something fun that I hope you all will enjoy :) See if you can spot the little LoL references within the pieces!

replies.body:
That looks like all kinds of fun :D  Particularly amused by 'Ezreal's attitude, and it's _always_ nice to hear Sona.  
Congratulations to every one of you - it looks like a lot of hard work!
